Login side subtitle: Grow together with the greatest experts at your side.
Register side body: heiEXPERT brings researchers and interested parties from all disciplines together to design projects and create and share knowledge. Create a comprehensive profile in which you present your specialist knowledge and your personal interests. With your academic  "business card " you have the opportunity to get in touch with other female scientists who can share your ideas and support you in realizing your goals!
Find experts body: Present your diverse skills, teaching and research to the university community. Here you can find suitable partners for exchange and collaboration.

Step One Text: Here you can enter what you are available for, e.g. mentoring, cooperation, lectures.
Step Two Text: Here you can enter your personal tags. The more powerful they are, the easier it will be for you to be found when searching. E.g. AI, lifelong learning, 3D, contemporary art, etc.
Step Three Text:
What distinguishes you personally as a scientist?


In one sentence: what describes you as a researcher? Which academic success is particularly important to you personally? What else distinguishes you that is relevant to your research?
Step Four Text:
I would like to network scientifically on the following topics:


What have you already researched? What topics are you currently researching? On which other topics from the scientific context would you like to network? [Example field „Transfer, teaching, organizational development....“]
Step Five Text:
Here you have the opportunity to trace your academic career:


Which universities did you graduate from? Which learning experiences on your way were particularly important? What additional training and further education do you personally stand out?
Step Six Text:
What other skills set you apart personally?


Do you do voluntary work or are you creative? Do you have special entrepreneurial talents? What qualities and/or skills do you bring with you that are or could be important in the university context?
Step Seven Text: Here you can name selected projects and link them using the @ sign. It is not about the complete listing of your research projects, but about your scientific expertise, which is important for the transfer. The link to other platforms is also possible here (website, social media)
Step Eight Text: Here you can search and follow other experts, giving you quicker access to the connected profiles. According to the current status, this only applies to members of Heidelberg University who register on heiEXPERT.
You are not employed at the university: You are not employed at the university
